document.full_text: marian gaborik of the new york rangers is to join up with the slovakia squad for the iihf world championship starting friday after his nhl side were knocked out of the playoffs.
document.title: ice hockey: gaborik joins slovak squad for worlds
lines_and_colors: marian gaborik of the new york rangers is to join up with the slovakia squad for the iihf world championship starting friday after his nhl side were knocked out of the playoffs.
